fpmExplorer:Page.title: Paginator
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Paginator building block enables you to render paginator buttons in scenarios where users have to navigate through a list of items.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Using the Paginator Building Block
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: To use the Paginator building block, you can include it in your view.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Initialize the Paginator Building Block
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: To use the paginator building block, you need to initialize it in your controller coding and need to define a list binding and current context.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Update the Page Context
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Once the user navigates to a new page through the paginator, you need to update the view context to reflect the new page's data.
